subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ahhh the infamous Fish!
author: Lisby
full_text:
Shit, Frank--I got one the other day that I haven't even pulled as a  
clip yet that says, "Believe in the fish."

Great. Don't they ever get bored???


On Aug 16, 2008, at 7:05 PM, Frank Sumption wrote:

> The Fish Group--a group of entities that seem to get great pleasure  
> form screwing wiht EVPers. Just when you think you're getting great  
> evidiecne and proo, it turns out to be these tricky jokers. Another  
> reason not to take everything a gospel truth.  I think it was  
> thoise researchers in Luxemberg(?) that first got these guys, but I  
> don't remeber for sure. So if you hear any reference to fish,  
> that's a clue that they are there. I am uncertain if they are bad  
> guys, or just tricksters.
>
> Frank-S
>
>
> See what people are saying about Windows Live. Check out featured  
> posts. Check It Out!
